biotools.summary:
An R package to estimate the concordance correlation, Pearson correlation and accuracy over time.

lcc is a package under development based on estimation procedures for longitudinal concordance correlation (lcc), longitudinal Pearson correlation (lpc), and longitudinal accuracy (la) through fixed effects and variance components of polynomial mixed-effect regression model.

Longitudinal Concordance Correlation.

Estimates the longitudinal concordance correlation to access the longitudinal agreement profile.
